channel.title: Hyperion- Secity
channel.description:
[size=18pt][u][b]Development Team[/b][/u][/size] [size=12pt]Me-Im the only person working on this project[/size]
The base im starting out with is iServer, I dont wanna start from a scratch Hyperion as im trying to do not as much work as possible.
I plan on making this server an economy PvP\Pk server, As in when you kill someone its actually gonna be worth something and your going to want to loot there items, As for most Pk\PvP server's you don't care and your looking for some item.
My Goals of this server: This will be my first Hyperion, I was really getting sick of unstable PI servers ... So I decided to go straight to the most stable base there is..Hyperion.
[b]These pictures are ripped from the release, just to show what combat system it already has: [/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/combatpre.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magemeleecombo.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/magicshort.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/mageshortbowspec.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/rangedefemotes.gif[/img] <--lagged [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15018011/gmaul.gif[/img]
Some quick question\answer:
Q: Will you release the server? A: Yes.
Q: Is Hyperion something you suggest? A: I do, but only if you have some experience on what your doing.
Q: Will newer Animations and things be loaded? A: I am going to try to, Not exactly sure how hard Hyperion will be but im in for a challenge ;)
Q: Will you make a Development post for more help? A: I might, Depending on how hard it is on just me, for the most part I like to work alone.
Q: Why Hyperion? A: I wanted a challenge\Something to do\More stable server.
Link to source im starting off of: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470958.msg3444135.html#msg3444135 - Rene\Canownueazy
Please make some suggestions if you have any, I am going to try to add new items and everything I can to make Hyperion comparable to PI sources now days.
[center][size=18pt][u][b]Update list[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center]Renamed 317 Deob Client[/center]

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Skills are going to be a pain in the ass but yeah eventually, Im going to make like I said an old school Pking only server with like pvp drops while that is playing ill be working on a server with better animations and gameframe ect. Then that will be my second world, After that im most likely going to make an eco world witch would require skills being done

Read full topic

item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Acorn_:

Goodluck with this, if you’re successful I’ll most likely join the servers community.

Thanks if you want you can be a Beta tester (Apply in Development Team), Im most likeley going to be fixing the actual base up Combat system and what not and then have the old school theme, That will be my first world and secound ill have higher loaded animations with new items like choatics and what not ;).

item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:19, topic:404037”]Mmk, here.

RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NumberF : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forIn at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown So at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown So at client.drawHPOrb(client.java:9609) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:9769) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:822 at client.processDrawing(client.java:892 at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4731) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Edit: Im going sleep cya guys.[/quote]

Alright, send me a PM when you get up and I’ll help ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:10, topic:404037”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=501097.msg3665915#msg3665915 date=1310613961]

I don’t think you realize 459 isn’t 317…

I don’t believe I ever said anything about 317.

Reasonable to infer you think PJA is a 317 after talking about PI servers and loading new animations. I realize you can load new animations on a 459 client, it’s just no one’s done it. Not that I’m aware of, anyways. Anyone who talks about loading new animations is generally referring to a fucked up 317 client.
[/quote]

Oh, well like I said this is my first Hyperion (Not trying use that as an excuse I realize what I said was stupid now), Just trying get things pointed in right direction before I start so I don’t waste my time ;)[/quote]

Well you’ll probly wanna use a 317 hyperion if you’re looking to add new anims and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion- Secity
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

death23:

Do you not know the difference between a server and a client? You don’t have to deal with the Hyperion base to load new animations, just cache pack it. As far as for the other guy not recommending PJA, that’s not a client, it’s a base. If you want a better client, use a deob.

It’s a PJA Client is what I mean it’s the client of the server im starting with. Also for the animations and thing’s I havent seen any Hyperion releases (The like 4 that I found) that had newer gameframe\Animations

pk2play:

I would just use a blank hyperion and just rip the updating and rendering and shit.

Still thinking about if I am going to start off with the Project-Annihilation or not, But if I don’t I will most likely do as you said.

Read full topic
